title: The All-Golf Fantasy Football Team
headline: The All-Golf Fantasy Football Team
description: Ever dream of Tiger playing football? How about Bubba trading in his pink driver for pink cleats? We got to thinking: what would an all-golf fantasy football team look like? You might like these guys more than your current NFL favorites.
body: Ever dream of Tiger playing football? How about Bubba trading in his pink driver for pink cleats? We got to thinking: what would an all-golf fantasy football team look like? You might like these guys more than your current NFL favorites.
